title: bitbollo
author: bitbollo
content: What happened:: Another site that claim to make AI investment with unrealistic APY.Scammers Profile Link:  N/AReference Link:  https://quantio.ai/Amount Scammed:  N/APayment Method:  N/AProof of Payment:  N/APM/Chat Logs:  N/AAdditional Notes:  I don't have been scammed, but I am seeing a lot of people sharing and commenting this website on several social network and youtube. There is not really much on that argument so I think a topic is needed.Why it's a scam? Because they are using just some buzzword (AI, automatic investment, staking, crypto and so on...) Fixed interest earning daily (0.30% - just insane - you can double money in less than one year!).This is just a ponzi, with a fake team, just a scam. Don't waste time and money!

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on September 05, 2023, 06:10:22 AMWhy it's a scam? Because they are using just some buzzword (AI, automatic investment, staking, crypto and so on...)When any website can create its own copyrighted content, own design then how they cover the 0.3$ fee they are just nothing but an upcoming scammer who will scam today or tomorrow. I have to avoid those at any cost.
